directions: Combine green kale, red kale, pecans, apple cider vinegar, honey, chipotle pepper powder, paprika, and liquid amino acid together in a bowl. Massage the kale mixture together using your hands until leaves are evenly coated and starting to soften, about 3 minutes; fold in avocado.
ingredients: 1 bunch green kale, stemmed and leaves roughly chopped
1 bunch red kale, stemmed and leaves roughly chopped
1 teaspoon liquid amino acid (such as Bragg®)
title: Smoky Kale Salad
